org.apache.taverna.platform.run.api

Interface RunService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RunServiceImpl

    public interface RunService
    Service for managing runs of Taverna workflows.
    Author:
    David Withers

    • Field Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getExecutionEnvironments

        Set<ExecutionEnvironment> getExecutionEnvironments()
        Returns the available ExecutionEnvironments.
        Returns:
        the available ExecutionEnvironments

      • getExecutionEnvironments

        Set<ExecutionEnvironment> getExecutionEnvironments(org.apache.taverna.scufl2.api.container.WorkflowBundle workflowBundle)
        Returns the ExecutionEnvironments that can execute the specified WorkflowBundle using its default Profile.
        Parameters:
        workflowBundle - the WorkflowBundle to find ExecutionEnvironments for
        Returns:
        the ExecutionEnvironments that can execute the specified WorkflowBundle

      • getExecutionEnvironments

        Set<ExecutionEnvironment> getExecutionEnvironments(org.apache.taverna.scufl2.api.profiles.Profile profile)
        Returns the ExecutionEnvironments that can execute the specified Profile.
        Parameters:
        profile - the Profile to find ExecutionEnvironments for
        Returns:
        the ExecutionEnvironments that can execute the specified Profile

      • createRun

        String createRun(RunProfile runProfile)
          throws InvalidWorkflowException,
                 RunProfileException
        Creates a new run and returns the ID for the run. To start the run use the start(String) method.
        Parameters:
        runProfile - the workflow to run
        Returns:
        the run ID
        Throws:
        InvalidWorkflowException
        RunProfileException

      • getRuns

        List<String> getRuns()
        Returns the list of runs that this service is managing.

        If there are no runs this method returns an empty list.

        Returns:
        the list of runs that this service is managing

      • open

        String open(File runFile)
     throws IOException
        Opens a run and returns the ID for the run.
        Parameters:
        runFile - the workflow run to open
        Returns:
        the run ID
        Throws:
        InvalidWorkflowException
        RunProfileException
        IOException

      • close

        void close(String runID)
    throws InvalidRunIdException,
           InvalidExecutionIdException
        Closes a run.
        Parameters:
        runID - the ID of the run
        Throws:
        InvalidRunIdException - if the run ID is not valid
        InvalidExecutionIdException

      • save

        void save(String runID,
          File runFile)
   throws InvalidRunIdException,
          IOException
        Saves a run.
        Parameters:
        runID - the ID of the run
        Throws:
        InvalidRunIdException - if the run ID is not valid
        InvalidExecutionIdException
        IOException

      • delete

        void delete(String runID)
     throws InvalidRunIdException,
            InvalidExecutionIdException
        Deletes a run.
        Parameters:
        runID - the ID of the run
        Throws:
        InvalidRunIdException - if the run ID is not valid
        InvalidExecutionIdException

      • start

        void start(String runID)
    throws InvalidRunIdException,
           RunStateException,
           InvalidExecutionIdException
        Starts a run.
        Parameters:
        runID - the ID of the run
        Throws:
        InvalidRunIdException - if the run ID is not valid
        RunStateException - if the run state is not CREATED
        InvalidExecutionIdException

      • pause

        void pause(String runID)
    throws InvalidRunIdException,
           RunStateException,
           InvalidExecutionIdException
        Pauses a running run.
        Parameters:
        runID - the ID of the run
        Throws:
        InvalidRunIdException - if the run ID is not valid
        RunStateException - if the run state is not RUNNING
        InvalidExecutionIdException

      • resume

        void resume(String runID)
     throws InvalidRunIdException,
            RunStateException,
            InvalidExecutionIdException
        Resumes a paused run.
        Parameters:
        runID - the ID of the run
        Throws:
        InvalidRunIdException - if the run ID is not valid
        RunStateException - if the run state is not PAUSED
        InvalidExecutionIdException

      • cancel

        void cancel(String runID)
     throws InvalidRunIdException,
            RunStateException,
            InvalidExecutionIdException
        Cancels a running or paused run.
        Parameters:
        runID - the ID of the run
        Throws:
        InvalidRunIdException - if the run ID is not valid
        RunStateException - if the run state is not RUNNING or PAUSED
        InvalidExecutionIdException

      • getState

        State getState(String runID)
        throws InvalidRunIdException
        Returns the current state of the run. A run's state can be CREATED, RUNNING, COMPLETED, PAUSED, CANCELLED or FAILED.
        Parameters:
        runID - the ID of the run
        Returns:
        the current state of the run
        Throws:
        InvalidRunIdException - if the run ID is not valid

      • getDataBundle

        org.apache.taverna.robundle.Bundle getDataBundle(String runID)
                                          throws InvalidRunIdException
        Returns the Bundle containing the data values of the run.
        Parameters:
        runID - the ID of the run
        Returns:
        the Databundle containing the data values of the run
        Throws:
        InvalidRunIdException - if the run ID is not valid

        WorkflowReport getWorkflowReport(String runID)
                          throws InvalidRunIdException
        Returns the status report for the run.
        Parameters:
        runID - the ID of the run
        Returns:
        the status report for the run
        Throws:
        InvalidRunIdException - if the run ID is not valid
